name: Massive multiplayer war shooter
description:
During one night people in your city gone mad! In the morning they woke up and instead of making coffee they took their guns and went out to kill their neighbors. You do not have time to think, you should take your gun and run out to protect your life.

Look sharp, shooting is everywhere, there are almost no rules on these streets. On radar you can see where exactly are the nearest enemies, so you can turn in time. Choose your favorite weapon and go ahead! Take part in the Massive multiplayer war shooter, kill your enemies before they kill you!

Key features:
  • - many types of weapons
  • - each weapon has its own characteristics
  • - 50 different personages
  • - different accessories to personalize your personage
  • - earn gold to buy additional 8 weapons
  • - localization for 60 languages
Controls:
  • - Up arrow - move forward
  • - Right arrow - turn right
  • - Left arrow - turn left
  • - Down arrow - move backward
